unit_specific.description: Add 3" to the range of this model's Contagion Range.
While this model is leading a unit, that unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless the attacking unit is within 18".

composition_and_wargear.unit_composition: This unit contains 1 Lord of Poxes.
composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: This model is equipped with: a plasma pistol and a great plague blade.

leader.can_lead_text: This model can be attached to the following units:
